name: Rock Simulator 2019
description: HEY, are you tired of the common life and you want to be a rock in a island in the middle of the sea, so this is for you. download the file, start the game, select if you want in the 24:00 or 12:00 and live the exciting life of a rock! the game is a """"remake"""" of rock simulator 2014, FEATURES: day night cycle, "better graphics" and a hole day of the rock dure 24 hours of the real life, more updates are going to come
